===Overview===
The Santo Marco Army is a component of the {{m|Santo Marco Armed Forces|Armed Forces}} of the [[Republic of Santo Marco]].{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Santo Marco (Country)|Santo Marco]]'s entry}}

===Augustine's rule===
<!-- Around 2009 -->At some point, tension grew in the country, with television talking about tribal grudges and atrocities on both sides of the conflict. Despite the presence of international observers, including [[United Nations (Earth-616)|United Nations]] [[United Nations Peacekeeping Forces (Earth-616)|Blue Helmets]], president [[Luis Augustine (Earth-616)|General Luis Augustine]] had soldiers to gather citizens to stadiums to use a retrofitted [[Sentinels|Sentinel]] to gene scan them, separating out everyone from the same tribe as the main rebel leaders, before performing mass killings{{r|War Machine Vol 2 1}}

===Duarte's rule===
When a tsunami hit [[Santo Marco (Country)|Santo Marco]], the army didn't arrive in time to evacuate a village, and [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]] consequently intervened to stop it. [[Suncorp Properties (Earth-616)|Suncorp]]'s soldiers arrived instants later (seemingly confused for the Army), inflicting upon Storm their anti-mutant bigotry. They then helped the inhabitants (later returning in an attempt to expel the inhabitants and take the land for a resort that was foiled by Storm).{{r|Storm Vol 3 1}}
